item.title: Fix TWRP E3004 Error on OnePlus2
item.description: I have recently installed LineageOS custom ROM on my OnePlus2 device to keep on trying new android versions as they come. While installing/updating the OS, I was getting below error on TWRP recovery screen. script aborted: E3004: This package is for device: OnePlus2,oneplus2; this device is . To fix this, I updated to the lastest version of TWRP for OnePlus2.
